articles.description: The longtime Tim Burton collaborator reportedly settled a suit for $830,000 but after failing to pay, his accuser is suing
articles.content:
The Oscar-nominated composer Danny Elfman is being sued after reportedly failing to pay $830,000 to an alleged victim of sexual harassment.
